landing.title: Register your SIM in 5 easy steps

verification.subtitle: REGISTER YOUR SIM
verification.title: 1. Verify your mobile number
verification.description: Provide your mobile phone number to receive your One-Time PIN via SMS

termsText.part1: By completing and submitting this form, I understand and agree that the personal data I will provide will be used to register my SIM and to manage and secure my Globe account, in compliance with the
termsText.part3: . I affirm that I am of legal age and that the information I will provide is true, accurate, and complete to the best of my knowledge. I acknowledge that any falsification, omission, or concealment of a material fact may result in administrative, civil, or criminal liability.

infoPage.heading: Welcome! Here's how to successfully register or update your SIM
infoPage.subHeading: Hi! Please read the guidelines below on how to successfully register your SIM.
infoPage.pointOne: If you are under 18 years old, please ask your parent or guardian to register your SIM.
infoPage.pointTwo: If your mobile number is owned by a business or enteprise, please contact your authorized representative to register your SIM.
infoPage.pointThree: Make sure you have one valid and active government-issued ID with a picture of your face.
infoPage.finalConditionDesc: I understand each of these items

stepTwo.desc: Select the registration type that best describes you

stepThree.pointOneMainDesc: Prepare a valid government-issued ID. Make sure that the photo and other information are clearly visible.
stepThree.pointOneAccordionDesc: Please ensure that the document follows these guidelines:
stepThree.pointOneAccordionBulletOne: The file format of supporting documents should be JPEG, PNG or BMP
stepThree.pointOneAccordionBulletTwo: The file size must be between 2 to 5MB.
stepThree.pointOneAccordionBulletThree: Text within the image must be clear, easily readable, and free from distortion.
stepThree.pointTwoMainResultSub: We've analyzed your document to determine if it meets the requirements.
stepThree.pointTwoMain: We'll capture the necessary details from the image, which you can review for accuracy.
stepThree.pointThreeMain:
Make sure that you are not using or wearing any accessories such as glasses or hats. Check that you are in a well-lit area with no other objects or people in your background. 
Look straight at the camera and smile.
stepThree.pointThreeResultSub: We've analyzed your ID document and selfie to determine authenticity.
stepThree.pointThreeVerifyNote: Verifies the identity document portrait scan against selfie scan.
stepThree.pointThreeSelfieText: We've analyzed your ID document and selfie to determine authenticity.
stepThree.documentScanHeading: Place your valid Government issued identity document in the camera frame.
stepThree.documentInstModalDescLabel: To ensure your ID document is clear and legible, follow these guidelines.
stepThree.documentInst1Label: No fingers or obstructions on document
stepThree.documentInst8Label: Please do not refresh the page, click the back button, or close the window during registration.
stepThree.selfieInstModalDescLabel: To ensure your selfie is clear and verifieable, follow these guidelines.
